abstract: Economic reports, corporate earnings and hearings this week in Washington.
snippet: Economic reports, corporate earnings and hearings this week in Washington.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS Data will include consumer credit for April (Monday); wholesale trade inventories for April and the beige book (Wednesday); the trade balance for April (Thursday); retail sales for May, business inventories for April and the University of Michigan consumer confidence index for June (Friday).

headline.main: Looking Ahead to Economic Reports This Week
